column1: '''Menegilda Brandybuck, n√©e Goold''', was a Hobbit of [[the Shire]].
Menegilda married [[Rorimac Brandybuck]], and with him got two children, [[Saradoc Brandybuck
She was not present at [[Bilbo Baggins]]' [[Bilbo's Farewell Party
The name contains ''meneg'' "much" and ''hild'' "battle".<ref>[[Jim Allan]] (ed.), ''[[An Introduction to Elvish]]'', "Giving of Names"</ref>
